A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I am another one of those people who created an account just to express my extreme disappointment in this film.
As a long time fan of the star wars movies i had been looking forward to seeing this movie in the cinema only to be let down with a pathetic cash grab by Disney.
So many plot holes\, pointless subplots and so much SJW nonsense.
This movie does no connect coherently with the previous star wars movies or its characters.
For example Luke Skywalker is turned into a coward and a weirdo\, NOT Luke Skywalker.
There is now nothing left to be excited about in the Star Wars franchise as all the new characters are boring or infantile.
Disney has killed Star Wars and shat on its grave
